metadata.title: CVE-2017-1000098 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: The net/http package's Request.ParseMultipartForm method starts writing totemporary files once the request body size surpasses the given "maxMemory"limit. It was possible for an attacker to generate a multipart requestcrafted such that the server ran out of file descriptors.

criterions.comment: golang: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
golang-1.6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
